author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add test to compare cell parameters for HCAL geometry by DDD vs DD4Hep

#### PR validation:

Make a comparison between the 2 versions and find identical results for HB

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special. Will be useful for testing ECAL geometry
title: Run3-hcx254 Add test to compare cell parameters for HCAL geometry by DDD vs DD4Hep
